ns2:test-suite.name: monitor nodes - handles all operations on nodes updateAllNodesStatus - updates the status of nodes according to last updated timestamp
ns2:test-suite.title: monitor nodes - handles all operations on nodes updateAllNodesStatus - updates the status of nodes according to last updated timestamp

test-case.name: should change status of node to no-response in case current status is running and last updated was above 60 seconds
test-case.title: should change status of node to no-response in case current status is running and last updated was above 60 seconds

test-case.name: should change status of node to no-response in case current status is warning and last updated was above 60 seconds
test-case.title: should change status of node to no-response in case current status is warning and last updated was above 60 seconds

test-case.name: should not change status in case current status is creating
test-case.title: should not change status in case current status is creating

test-case.name: should not change status in case current status is deleting
test-case.title: should not change status in case current status is deleting

test-case.name: should not do anything in case node status is running and last update is less than 60 seconds
test-case.title: should not do anything in case node status is running and last update is less than 60 seconds

test-case.name: should change status to running if last update is less than 60 seconds and current status is no-response
test-case.title: should change status to running if last update is less than 60 seconds and current status is no-response

test-case.name: should call manager.publish - remove-node if no response and node.sigterm
test-case.title: should call manager.publish - remove-node if no response and node.sigterm
